Intuit QuickBooks
Let's connect!
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c},
I'm {!User.FirstName}, your dedicated Quickbooks Consultant at Intuit. First of all, let me thank you for your interest in QuickBooks & signing up for a free trial. I attempted to contact you on several occasions but were unable to do so. I request you to suggest when can we connect so that we can show you the important features of QuickBooks, and help you understand how it can work for your business.
Benefits of QuickBooks for Business Owners:
• See who owes you money and send them reminders • Get instant insights to your finances • Get complete visibility of your business (balance sheet, P&L, tax details) with a click • Monitor key trends in your business like cash flow and revenue • Easy invoicing and estimates • Online banking integration • Multi user login, accountant login • Track sales and expense
Feel free to call me on the number given below or drop me an email to discuss in detail.
Thanks & Regards {!User.Name} Quickbooks Consultant {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email}
